configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - US National

scenarios.description: The Adaptive Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 7 days. Updated 2020-10-06.

The Adaptive-MoreControl Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections, but considers the impact if there is a 15% decrease in transmission starting November 26th, 2020. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 7 days. Updated 2020-10-20.

The Adaptive-LessControl Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections, but considers the impact if there is a 15% increase in transmission starting November 26th, 2020. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 7 days. Updated 2020-10-20.
